Behavior, maybe focus more on the game play experience of your players instead of pushing through woke virtue signalling that a grand total of (zero) people asked for. I want to recommend this game, but find it impossible when the title decides that adding a gay flag belt charm, censoring half of the English language, or magically making voiceless characters gay after 4 years of release takes precedent over all else. Netflix has the funds to shoulder the tens of thousands of dropped accounts in response to their unwanted virtue signalling, do you? -Sincerely, The formerly silent and cringing majority of your community
playing as the killer is so fun but most survivors are allways so toxic for absolutelly no reason, i m just trying to have fun

Chose fake presentation for gays in a game about murdering survivors. How does this represent me? and.. How is it helping? It isn't even necessary. Your brewing controversy for no reason. Why does your sexual preference matter when the goal isn't to "hook-up" or tell people your interesting in banging Dwight? It's about surviving. Focus on that.

The game keeps getting worse with each update. It takes months or sometimes year for unbalanced stuff to be nerfed and useless stuff to actually serve a purpose. Matchmaking is busted. Community is toxic. Long queue times. Devs rarely listen to the community. Furthermore, the grind is clearly the worst aspect of this game. The best build are locked behind a paywall and the good build literally takes hundreds of hours to unlock. This of course can be solved by putting money in the game. There is also a lack of communication with other survivor when you are not in a party with your friend.  Would strongly recommend not buying before major improvement are made to the game.
Funny game, but they should add among us to it

Antes de probar este juego pasaba por momentos difíciles, quede huérfano, me robaron el almuerzo, mi novia me engaño con mi padre, me expulsaron de la escuela, mi dealer subió los precios, me banearon de Steam por piratear juegos, me secuestraron y estoy siendo enjuiciado por crímenes de guerra en Yugoslavia. Creía que mi vida ya no tendría sentido así que me compre una Glock 18 punto rojo, cañón estriado, cargador ampliado y con empuñadura antideslizante para ponerle fin a mi existencia, me despedí de todos mis compradores de órganos en Internet y mientras lo hacía me apareció un anuncio de este juego, decidí probarlo ¿qué más iba a perder? Ya iba a pintar la pared con mis sesos. Impresionantemente, cambio mi vida, mi autoestima subió, mis padres volvieron, los cargos por mi red de trata de personas fueron anulados y me encuentro actualmente en recuperación por consumo excesivo de morfina; he empezado a dar charlas en las iglesias, sencillamente este juego me salvo, LO RECOMIENDO, también puede salvarte a ti, pruébalo.
Perfect horror games like friday the 13th its a great game to play if you like horror still being updated to this day udates are far and wide though but still good gameplay,stories and maps/

Yo! Played this game as a default background for years, but the game is such mismanaged to hurt new players that it's over. I think this is the worst the game has ever been in and I don't see it getting better. It favors both survivors playing un-altruistic and killers playing as anti altruistic as possible, which ruined the whole premise of the game. I have to say I am finally uninstalling after years of trying to preach the importance of adding this game to most players backgrounds.
Achei o jogo incrível, alem de poder jogar com os amigos, ele possui muitos personagens clássicos de filmes de terror que eu gosto muito, recomendo que joguem<3
Fun game to play with friends
Este juego mola más aun cuando le encuentras el truco! Si te aburres de ser perseguido, puedes perseguir!! Sin duda juego del añoo!!!

i love this game its the best
absolutely love this game, definitely will never expect the same killer/player twice in a row which makes it more exciting!
This game makes me sweat like a hooker in church. 10/10

Ich kann das Game nur Empfehlen es macht riesen Spaß, auch wenn man denken sollte das es sehr eintönig ist bieten die ganze überlebenden mit ihren verschiedenen Perks immer neue Spielweisen und Taktiken die für viel Abwechslung sorgen. 
Falls es dann doch irgendwann mal zu langweilig wird vor dem Killer zu fliehen, spielt man eben selbst den Killer und Jagt die Überlebenden quer über die Map, durch die ganzen Killer mit ihren einzigartigen Fähigkeiten ist für jeden der passende Killer dabei der am besten zur eigenen Spielweise passt ob Offensive, Taktisch oder Lieber leise die überlebenden Staken und dann direkt mit einem schlag killen.
lixo, me arrependi de cada centavo que ja gastei aqui
